meaningMnemonic: You have an <kanji>excuse</kanji> that <kanji>permit</kanji>s you to do what you want. It is a <vocabulary>license</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>certificate</vocabulary> allowing you to do this.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
